item.description:
Forget about London

Don't worry about France

You can see Tufts Underpants!!

Tufts students will be performing Steve Martin's adaptation of the hilarious Spring romp, "The Underpants" at Balch Arena Theater.

The play is described as follows: Everyone was wearing underpants when the King was on parade.  But only Louise's underpants fell to the ground when she was stretching for a better view.  She quickly snatched them up with the hopes that no one had noticed her "indiscretion."  Little did she realize that more than one observer saw her skivvies slip to the street.  Through the reaction of the men who witnessed the faux pas, Louise learns much about her husband, the nature of men, and even the King himself.

So, don't get caught with your pants down by missing out on the opportunity to share a few laughs with your colleagues and to observe our talented students perform.

Tickets are free for the first ten people who RSVP...but they are only a buck for everyone else.

Note: If you are interested in dinner, please RSVP to that Meet-up event separately.  You are welcome to attend both or either event.

For information about the performance or Tufts theater, please check out this link: http://ase.tufts.edu/drama-dance/performances/drama.asp

Other wise, feel free to contact me through this site.
item.how_to_find_us: We will gather in the lobby of the theater, towards the entrance to the Aidekman Art Gallery
